bibl.title: Two Wooden Tablet Receipts for the Ptolemaic Vineyard Tax (Apomoira): T Norwich 1921.37.51.1 and 1921.37.51.2.
bibl.note: Jeremiah Colman and the Norwich Castle Museum Egyptian Collection. - The Demotic Tablet Receipts. T. Norwich Castle Mus. Inv. 1921.37.51.1 (Pathyris, February/March 108 BC); - Inv. 1921.37.51.2 (Pathyris, 9 February 106 BC).
